PMDGOPTIONS.DLL SHOULD BE PLACED IN: 

C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Microsoft Flight Simulator X\PMDG\dlls 

NOT the Modules folder.

For people who need help.

To shop the panels from disapearing after takeoff you must:

Follow the instructions but:

- RENAME the pmdgoptions.dll in the crack folder to PMDGOptions.dll (notice the capital letters)
- Place it in 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Microsoft Flight Simulator X\PMDG\dlls' folder
- To get the enable button to work you must run it as administrator
- To edit the 'hosts' file, open it with notepad, save the edited file (after you have added the ip address) to your desktop, drag and drop the current 'hosts' file to the recycling bin, drag and drop the edited 'hosts' file from your desktop to the folder.

I felt like i need to contribute to the community so hope i helped.
